meanings.definition: Not eligible; not meeting the necessary requirements or qualifications.
meanings.sent1: Her ineligibility for the contest disappointed her.
meanings.sent2: The student's ineligibility for the scholarship was due to low grades.
meanings.sent3: His ineligibility to join the team made him practice harder.
meanings.sent4: The ineligibility of the old bridge for heavy trucks was evident.
meanings.sent5: The ineligibility of the expired coupon was clearly stated on it.

meanings.definition: The state of being ineligible; the condition of not being qualified or suitable.
meanings.sent1: The ineligibility of the candidate surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The team's ineligibility for the tournament was a setback.
meanings.sent3: The ineligibility of the cat for the dog show was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The ineligibility of the worn-out shoes for the race was disappointing.
meanings.sent5: The ineligibility of the broken umbrella for the rain was ironic.
